name: Terrordrome: Rise of the Boogeymen
summary:
Terrordrome – Rise of the Boogeymen is fan made game, a tribute to the most popular horror movie icons of the 70's, 80's to 90's and for the first time all your favorite horror character are bound together in a unique fighting game. Decide who's the most evil and badass boogeyman in fearsome battles.
Terrordrome is a dream come true for any fan of the horror genre and video games.
